name: Struggling for home
description:
Game made during Global Game Jam 2019.

You're a boy,  who is home alone. Your parents left the house again, but something is weird this time... You heard the knock, you go downstairs... and see a zombie trying to come inside!!! This is an endless 2D game where you have to protect your home from zombies.

Credits: 

Programming - Gulagha Gozalov

Characters, sprites and animations - Ksenija Jevsejeva

Sprites and backgrounds - Leyli Bunyadzade

All artwork were created during the Jam.
